sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Person } from './personal'; @Component({ selector: 'app-personal-form', templateUrl: './personal-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./personal-form.component.css'] }) export class PersonalFormComponent { pronouns = ['He/Him', 'She/Her', 'They/Them', 'Other']; model = new Person(0, '', '', ''); submitted = false; showAdditional = false; onSubmit() { this.submitted = true; } newHero() { this.model = new Person(42, '', ''); } showAdditionalSection() { if (this.model.pronoun === 'pronoun[3]') { this.showAdditional = true; } else { this.showAdditional = false; } } }

Personal Information

Your name is required
Your email is required
Your pronouns are required
yes
  

Thank you for your submission.

Here is a summary of what you have submitted

Name:
{{ model.name }}
Email:
{{ model.email }}
Pronouns:
{{ model.pronoun }}
